powerplay

An R API client for the NHL API

Documenting the publicly accessible portions of the NHL API.

Overview

This API client was generated by the swagger-codegen project. By using the OpenAPI/Swagger spec from a remote server, you can easily generate an API client.

Installation

You can install the released version of powerplay from GitHub with:

# You can install using the pacman package using the following code:
if (!requireNamespace('pacman', quietly = TRUE)){
  install.packages('pacman')
}
pacman::p_load_current_gh("saiemgilani/powerplay")

Documentation

For more information on the package and function reference, please see the powerplay documentation website.

Breaking Changes

Our Authors

Citations

To cite the powerplay R package in publications, use:

BibTex Citation

@misc{sgetal2021powerplay,
  author = {Saiem Gilani},
  title = {powerplay: The SportsDataverse Package for Hockey Data.},
  url = {https://saiemgilani.github.io/powerplay/},
  year = {2021}
}
